title: 1.1471 STATE FIRE MUSEUM.
text: The Bill and Bonnie Daniels Firefighters Hall and Museum in the city of Minneapolis is designated as the official state fire museum.

==: Bill and Bonnie Daniels Firefighters Hall and Museum

examples.museum_name: Bill and Bonnie Daniels Firefighters Hall and Museum
Bill and Bonnie Daniels Firefighters Hall and Museum

consequences: The museum is designated as the official state fire museum.
